website_summaries.verdict: If space is an issue, this small microwave will still provide reasonable heating power while taking up as little room as possible.
pros: Ideal for quick reheating or single-use dishes, the 700 watts of power gets the job done
Features include auto and manual defrost functions
This is a great choice for a guest house or dorm room
cons: Intended for moderate use, and frequent use may shorten the life of the unit significantly

customer_reviews.title: Owned for less than three months. There is some ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned for less than three months. There is some kind of defect in the interior. I discovered this when the right inner wall of the microwave started sparking and then caught fire. I’m calling GE customer service on Monday for a refund. It’s a nice-looking microwave and worked well for the few months I owned it. I’m no expert, but microwaves generally shouldn’t catch fire. Luckily I was close by and could put it out right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE IT DIES IN LESS THAN A FEW MONTHS.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on October 21, 2017. But it died dead as door nail on 2/15/18. WHAT !!! Thats right, and call for a refund or return to factory for repair and forget it, passed from one phone operator to another.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Barely functions as a microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is a shockingly terrible microwave. I have had many other GE microwaves that worked great. This heats stuff very unevenly. It only heats things if you put them in the exact middle of the machine. So the edges of your plates are always cold. I barely use I micro so I thought having a tiny machine wouldn’t bother me - but when it always messes up with basic things like popcorn it really drives me bonkers!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This Mini GE microwave is better than the full size Magic Chef it replaced
customer_reviews.text: This Mini GE microwave is better than the full size Magic Chef it replaced, and doesn't cover up my beautiful new backsplash. Microwave Popcorn comes out perfectly every time. Unfortunately, this was not the case with the full size Magic Chef. If you're on the fence, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurette Beard

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my same size GE microwave that died after 10 yrs. The one I received is NOT the one pictured on Amazon website. What is different is the turntable in my new microwave is completely different from the one pictured. The plate provided does not fit well onto the turntable gear. It is wobbily and if you don't place anything other than a dinner plate (i.e coffee mug to glass jar) exactly in the middle of the glass plate the unbalanced action of the turntable could topple the mug or jar and spill its contents. This could be very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Small, yet fully functional.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is so great! We have been wanting to get a smaller microwaves to set on a hanging shelf. This is the perfect addition. Stainless steel front, looks great, easy to use! It really does hold a large dinner plate! We've put all the same things in this microwave as we did our last full-size one. This microwave requires a longer cook time, but not by much. Most things just an extra 30 seconds. Would totally buy it again. I was afraid of any non-major brand microwave, and GE has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney F

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: It may be small but it is mighty! We needed a small microwave for the spot in our kitchen and this is what we picked. It works great, heats well. It is small but holds a dinner plate and any bowls that size or smaller. If you want to heat a 9x13 pan this isn't the one for you. Excellent product for the price too. Only negative comment is the ding (bell) is really loud but GE thought of everything and you can turn off the sounds. so now it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Kauer

customer_reviews.title: Small yet powerful, with a slight learning curve.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave gets the job done, and is surprisingly powerful. It does not take up much counterspace,but as a tradeoff it can't fit larger plates. Though stadard size paper plates fit just fine. This microwave will start without pressing cook/go/enter, because if say you press 1 it will assume you want to cook for 1 minute. This feature can be useful but it takes some getting use to. If you want to put in a very specific time you have to press time cook then enter your desired time, then press start. Other than that issue, this is a quality little machine that looks fairly stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Frisco

customer_reviews.title: Does not move when i push the open button and feels significantly more solid and better built than a lot of the other smaller microwaves ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller microwave for my space and this one works perfectly. Does not move when i push the open button and feels significantly more solid and better built than a lot of the other smaller microwaves I looked at for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Expert

customer_reviews.title: Cooking in the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for its relatively small size as I live alone in a small apartment in NYC. Size is great and despite the low square footage and wattage, holds a decent sized plate and heats food quickly. My only complaint is that due to its small size and weight, when you push the door release button, the whole unit moves under the pressure of the opening. A little bit of a hassle, but nothing I can't manage. Thought about putting a non-slip rubber beneath it to help -- just not sure about whether that's a fire hazard. Overall, good!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Niedzwiecki

customer_reviews.title: small but reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Like many previous reviewers, I've placed this unit inside an upper cabinet in my kitchen. I have IKEA, which are 15" deep and gives me plenty of room to close the cabinet doors. I will at some point either drill a hole for the plug to go straight down to an outlet, or move the unit onto the countertop. Why remove it from the cabinet? the jury is still out on if the microwave unit is creating a moisture problem or not. It is used daily and so far all is well.
customer_reviews.author: corgi lover

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat things fast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is good for little plates of food, but if you like to eat, like me, then you need a bigger microwave or be very patient. Typically it takes up to 4 or 5 minutes to heat up a plate of food. In most cases its easier to throw your food on the stove. If you eat a lot of pre-packaged microwave meals, do not buy this. Get one with 1000W. The part I do like about this thing, is how small it is. I have a small galley kitchen and it fits snug in the corner and doesn't take up too much counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J.

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, Can Fit Kitchen Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Replaces a former version of this microwave on our kitchen counter. It is smaller, lighter weight, and both the glass tray and tray ring are reduced in size from the older version. It is designed, I think, to fit inside a kitchen cabinet, which is its best use. Be aware that it is extremely noisy: loud door clink on opening and closing, noticeable noise when cooking, loud ding when finished. It operates at one of the lesser power levels, so takes longer to heat food and drink. However, it's inexpensive, easy to move around and takes up less counter space. Great for reheating individual portions, which is what we use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look for a compact microwave
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look for a compact microwave. It doesn't fit a tall travel coffee mug, but it does fit a full size plate and all of my food storage containers. Looks nice on my countertop and fits neatly into the corner space. Controls are easy to figure out. Takes longer to cook at this wattage than my previous beast of a microwave. The family complained when it first showed up, but everyone has adjusted just fine. Nice quality for the price and I'm pleased with it in my small kitchen. I've been using it now for about 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Blazes

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like burning wire and started to smoke
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a couple months. Smelled like burning wire and started to smoke.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This microwave blew up after 3 uses. I would not recommend making this purchase to anyone. :( I only gave it 1 star because the system would not let me submit my review unless I clicked on a star. It doesn't deserve a star.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gill

customer_reviews.title: Good Worker
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Major issue is steam captured in the microwave itself. After each use, I need to wipe down the door and soak up puddles of water under the turn-tray.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Small, Attractive, a Little Bit Slower
customer_reviews.text: A small, attractive microwave that fits where you want it to and does what it needs to. I found myself adding 50-100% more time compared to a conventional microwave to get my food where I wanted it to be and that doesn't bother me at all - we're still talking less than 5 minutes. Absolutely great for reheating but I can't speak for cooking - I never cook in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: james mizoguchi

customer_reviews.title: Great Downsize.
customer_reviews.text: Small space outside, yet seems large enough inside . One review said hard to open the door. I see what they are doing. Don't press in the middle of the 1x4" handle, but to the left end of handle where the latch would be located. Opens easily. Great for stem bags or smaller dishes. Love mine as it is quiet and seems accurate.
customer_reviews.author: AZB@NC

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice microwave. Besides being pretty sleek
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for use in our [very small] kitchen at our office. It's a nice microwave. Besides being pretty sleek, it seems to work well. The only reason I'm deducting a star is for the size. I understand the dimensions are laid out clearly, however, the cooking area seems to be significantly smaller than other microwaves of this size. We find ourselves regularly coming up with creative ways to microwave larger meals.Otherwise, we've been happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Forks Up

customer_reviews.title: Great little microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great little microwave! It took a bit to get used to it, because it was smaller and less powerful than my previous microwave, but it still works great. Just have to adjust cooking times. It looks really good too! Great for small kitchens!
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed to see how sturdy and high quality this microwave turned out to be. We looked at several others and they were cheaply made and would often tip forward when the door was opened. This microwave does not tip when opened, which is huge. Since it will be used in a dorm and more then likely will have a tray of various supplies on top of it. My daughter also likes the silencing feature. This will help minimize disturbing roommates when it is being used late at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for counter tops
customer_reviews.text: I had this microwave in my last apartment, so naturally I thought I’d get one for my new apartment. For some reason it always feels like the buttons are in the wrong places. Other than that it’s good. Doesn’t take up too much space on the counter
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: For a summer/weekend home it's a great cheap functional unit. If I had to use it every day I'd throw it out. No features, just bare bones and low power...and noisy too.....but it gets the job done, ultimately.
customer_reviews.author: sendcash

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the recommendation of SweetHome/ the Wirecutter but I am unhappy with it. Very small. A full size bag of popcorn cannot rotate during heating. Feels cheap. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: VQ

customer_reviews.title: Space saver and good looks.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks great. Also does not use up lots of space in my tiny kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Harwood62

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. I’ve had it two weeks and it only works occasionally. Don’t buy a GE microwave.
customer_reviews.author: BJM

customer_reviews.title: works like a champ and doesn’t take up a bunch of ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small microwave to fit in my island cabinet, i have two kids and it’s gotten more use than I thought it would, works like a champ and doesn’t take up a bunch of room. You really don’t need a larger microwave than this unless you’re cooking dinner in it each day.
customer_reviews.author: Daniek

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Work properly but not as expected. The sized of the microwave were perfect to what I need however it's not strong enough. It take more then usual to defrost and it;s getting annoying
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little microwave
customer_reviews.text: Thought I need a larger microwave! Save your counter space & purchase this little wonder. Only 700 watts, but cooks fast & evenly. I like to cook grits , rice & oatmeal in microwave. This does them all and more to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Small but decent power and basic functions. Looks nice and easy to operate. The best feature is being able to turn off the annoying beeps when using buttons or finishing a cooking cycle. I would recommend this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Higly Recommeneded
customer_reviews.text: Best Microwave I have owned. Cook times are great and heat up for food is fast.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Evans

customer_reviews.title: Built a better wheel
customer_reviews.text: This unit is great. Super compact, one plate capacity but does everything you need it to do. I really like the "one button" touch feature. Press 1 unit goes in for one minute. Press 2 unit goes on the 2 minutes. Very intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: tbrian

customer_reviews.title: Possible fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact this microwave is but it didn’t last long and smoked several times. Seems like a fire hazard. Don’t recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Lunamiela

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's just a microwave, but I love it. The color is nice, it's small like my kitchen, and it workers perfectly for one. It is on the small side, but that's just what I wanted. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter's dorm room.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter's dorm room. Matches well with her stainless mini-fridge and stainless coffee maker. She likes her stylish mini-kitchen nook in her room.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: GE small microwave
customer_reviews.text: A litle less powerful than its big sister, but for its size it does a great job. It takes a little longer than larger capacity microwaves but this has to be expected for a smaller unit.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, nothing wrong with it, good little microwave for the price, fits right on top of a magic chef mini fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Johnsson

customer_reviews.title: A good little unit but-----
customer_reviews.text: You are on your own when setting it up for use. For example the meager instructions callouts don't match the item names on the control panel.
customer_reviews.author: Darol Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Works well, great for small kitchen. My only complaint is that it started sqeaking a little when it rotates, about a month in, but it works perfectly fine. The auto-heat options aren't useful at all, but who really uses those?
customer_reviews.author: William S Looney

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in, doesn't work. Tried three outlets. Dead as a doornail. Also, it is tinny and the door wasn't lined up right and was attached so it extends about an eighth inch above the rest of it. Returning. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: penelope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sleeper hit of this microwave is the ability to turn off all beeps.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Compared, purchased, VERY satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Small, cute, quiet, easy to learn and use. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Karenina

customer_reviews.title: Broke After Six Months
customer_reviews.text: It worked for six months and is now trash. I don’t even use it that often. This morning I went to heat up some bread for a few seconds and it no longer works. I didn’t put anything in there other than bread! Agh now I don’t have a working microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pudenz

customer_reviews.title: worked well initially, but deteriorated frustratingly fast
customer_reviews.text: After half a year of usage the push button for opening is barely working, and it does not heat as well as it did when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: YLO

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The size is small and perfect for even our largest of plate to still fit!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase. The item meets all our expectations ! An efficient micro-wave oven that takes a small space on our kitchen counter. Thank you for accurately representing this item in your description.
customer_reviews.author: richieB

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a year! Caught food on fire!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year, piece of junk! It’s a nice small size, but went to reheat a sweet potato and it caught on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B.

customer_reviews.title: Short cord limited counter placement.
customer_reviews.text: Instructional sheet omits explanations of codes the screen puts up. Clearing and starting over requires patience until user figures out bypasses.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty
customer_reviews.text: Smaller BUT I love the extra counter space. I can put things on it. Just big enough to turn a plate. I've adjusted and love it!
customer_reviews.author: H. Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this GE Microwave in September 6 Months later it is broken. It is not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Trieu Do

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very small and does not work like it should. Kept it but turn table is not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even last 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in November 2018. It’s already shot - suddenly the microwave won’t actually turn off unless it’s unplugged! As soon as you plug it back in it turns in again and just keeps heating - none of the buttons work to cancel it or stop it from cooking. Unfortunately my return window on the product has closed now too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money, indubitably.
customer_reviews.text: Enough said. It's terrific. The only thing I would change is the location of the Start/On button. Otherwise, it works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Elise NYC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot smaller than I had anticipated, a regular sized dinner plate does not fit in it
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Small and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected,even though I checked the measurements. Lightweight, so the whole thing moves when opening and closing the door, larger plates and such don't fit. Keeping it for now, then passing it on to one of the kids for their dorm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Nice microwave, had to return because it was too small for what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, small microwave
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t take up much space, light weight, easy to use. The only negative is it is lower power so you have to get used to microwaving for more time if you used to have a bigger one. But it’s easy and good!
customer_reviews.author: David Buie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: As described and fits into small nook in kitchen. Fits regular-sized plate. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Small, quiet, very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a small 700 W unit. No point expecting it to heat stuff up as fast as a 1100 W unit. It has worked out well as a second backup unit for our bedroom closet. Particularly nice: it has the option to turn off all beeps, which is very nice for late night operation.
customer_reviews.author: Shami Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint, large capacity.
customer_reviews.text: Door is noisy, but get used to it. Ability to turn sound off is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, very small profile
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, very small profile, works great. Writing on buttons is very, very small, so only gave 4 vs. 5 stars. You really have to memorize or put your nose close to the appliance to read the labels. Writing is kind of tiny dark grey on black, so....hard to read. If they correct that, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Great little microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great little microwave. We downsized and we're sceptical. Based on reviews we purchased it and have been happy with performance.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Doverspike

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: It stinks inside like electrical burning wire. Stinks up your food
customer_reviews.author: Termite

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave in the summer and it’s already broken. One day it started smelling of burning plastic, and stopped warming things up entirely. Definitely don’t waste your money on this. I will just be throwing it out at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love it. A perfect small size that we needed in a special place in the house. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly and looks great, would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: We looked for a microwave that would fit on our bookshelf for a few months, then found this one. It fit perfectly and looks great, would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Ellett

customer_reviews.title: Compact in size.  Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Has an audible "Done" alarm that can be silenced ahead of use.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great little microwave
customer_reviews.text: Very neat little microwave. Perfect for the limited space on our counter top
customer_reviews.author: R.L. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great small microwave for the price! Not the most powerful. That is the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Maulikky

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: Heats most foods very well in a timely manner. My Presto Power Pop will not fully pop all kernels with such low wattage, though. Oven is a real keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Fremont Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small size microwave
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small size microwave. Great for reheating mugs, small dishes and small plates. A regular dinner plate fits in comfortably - not much larger will fit. We got rid of our big microwave because we only reheat our coffee/tea.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and compact size. Have only had a month but haven’t had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: tianna Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Quality Convenience-sized Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and functionality options in a small unit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaStef

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: The microwave broke after one month, I just missed the return window by 1 week. It made maybe 3 bags of popcorn and 4 reheated dinners. I would not recommend buying this microwave unless you enjoy throwing money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Derr

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working right outside of warrenty
customer_reviews.text: After a year of doing what it’s intended to do it stopped working right outside the warranty. However it does work if you hold the power cord a certain way. So if you’re fine with standing directly next to it, holding the power cord just right, buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat well
customer_reviews.text: Product is not heating well at all .I need to heat 2 it 3 times.nit satisfied at all .
customer_reviews.author: Jurgen Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my beach house to set on counter. Like the small size and does everything a large one does.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Childs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Thought it was going to be a little bigger but the size was fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Saran Diakite

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great microwave for the price. Fits a full size plate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken microwave less than a year old.
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond upset that less than a year this microwave has broken. Can it be replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Catches on fire
customer_reviews.text: It exploded and is catching on fire 9 months after purchase- and no metal or inappropriate materials were placed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. White

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality:(
customer_reviews.text: It took it return before the thing inside it truned black and smell bad:(
customer_reviews.author: Pakjira

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues, except it sits a little unlevel with no means of adjusting the foot pads.
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: Died quickly
customer_reviews.text: We set up this microwave on October first 2018. It died on February third 2019. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Madison McSweeney

customer_reviews.title: Did not make it two months
customer_reviews.text: Broke only after 2 months of use bad connection wonder if it was the way it was shipped
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Marci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works like a charm no problems and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Darren V. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: I hope this one lasts better. It was under contract and I am still ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for another one that burned up the previous year. It is the only microwave that fits into the slot in my kitchen. It is a bit tricky to use in that the sometimes words come on the screen and you have to open the door to get rid of them. I hope this one lasts better. It was under contract and I am still waiting to get the replacement cost from GE.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: We have occasionally used this microwave and to our dismay ...
customer_reviews.text: We have occasionally used this microwave and to our dismay, it gets out of sync all the time. Really a hassle. Thus the one star rating because we are just outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Brophy

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The microwave looked good and would have been a good fit for the tight space, but it would not turn on. I plugged it into different working outlets but nothing happened. The box did not look damage or opened (original factory tape). Waste of time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: From NYC

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Five star cause I love the look and perfect size. I cant remember if I've used it. I bought it just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Trendy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller interior  than expected
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my 11.5 inch diameter plates. The door opening is about 10 3/4 inches wide. Slightly larger plates can fit through if tipped sideways. I could set my 11.5 inch diameter plates flat on the rotating plate, but no matter how carefully I tried to center them one side always rubbed the wall of the microwave during cooking. It is too bad because it looks great and does indeed fit into a very small space.
customer_reviews.author: H. Day

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 month with little use.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is a piece of junk. Had it in our office with only 1 person using it and it has died already, we’ve only had it for 2 months. It started making a loud noise about a month in and then stopped heating about a month after that. Now it’s just sitting on the floor of the office taking up space. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian T.

customer_reviews.title: Good luck with square plates
customer_reviews.text: Cute and efficient, this is exactly what I was looking for! Be mindful of the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massive dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit, put it on my boat. Fit and looked great. Since it's on the boat we didn't use it for a month or so after the initial test use and now that I can't return it via Amazon it's proven (very) defective. After popping a single bag of popcorn, it now blows it's own internal fuse after running for two to three seconds (I replaced the fuse several times to test it). So i have a $100 bag of popcorn and a brand new microwave-shaped paper weight. Am thinking shipping it for repair will be pretty expensive and may just try to give it to a local shop to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: different color
customer_reviews.text: shorter length wise than I am use to, my only issue is the picture shows light grey stainless steel which I wanted to match appliances but this one is a dark grey color, but whats done is done.
customer_reviews.author: Kimani N. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work from the beginning and we let the return period pass.
customer_reviews.author: kaylaleah

customer_reviews.title: Small & Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice space saver and it works great. Not much power because of its size, but that's o.k. It's a real nice unit for limited counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave -- Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a second one of these I have purchased for a second home. We loved it so much we just got another one exactly like our first! A really good buy too!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I buy GE cause my family worked and retired from General Electric
